hr.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Vaš autorizacijski kod nije valjan.

Molimo vas da kopirate i zalijepite cijelu URL adresu koji smo vam poslali putem e-maila.
hr.auth.forgot_link: Zaboravio sam korisničko ime ili lozinku
hr.auth.forgot.email_help: Upišite e-mail adresu sa Vašeg računa i poslat čemo vam vaše informacije za prijavu.
hr.auth.forgot.heading: Povrat informacija za prijavu
hr.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Hmm, ta e-mail adresa nije u našem sistemu. Pokušajte ponovo. A možda se samo još niste prijavili?
hr.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Poslali smo vaše informacije za prijavu na vašu e-mail adresu. Želimo vam dobar dan!
hr.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Prije nego što se prijavite u Game Jolt, moramo provjeriti vašu e-mail adresu koju ste nam dali. Nadamo se da niste koristili tuđu adresu!

Poslali smo vam e-mail sa uputama kako da ovlastite svoj račun.
hr.You found a secret! But upon further ins: Našli ste tajnu!Ali,daljnim istraživanjem,shvatili ste da je to samo prazna stranica.
hr.Completely free with no option to pay at: Potpuno besplatno bez ikakve opcije plaćanja.
Primaj e-mailove kada netko kupi vaše igre.
hr.Check your Internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
hr.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
hr.This allows you to disable right mouse c: Ovo Vam omogućuje da koristite desni klik. Koristite ovo samo ako vaša igra treba izbjeći desni klik.
Your game details have been saved.

hr.You've published your game to the site!: You've published your game to the site! Huzzah! Remember to spread the word...

hr.Are you sure you want to publish this re: Are you sure you want to publish this release? All of its builds will become active on your game page.

hr.Are you sure you want to remove this rel: Are you sure you want to remove this release? All of its builds will be removed as well.
hr.The release and its builds have been rem: The release and its builds have been removed from the package.
hr.Are you sure you want to hide this relea: Are you sure you want to hide this release? It will no longer be accessible from your game page.

hr.Are you sure you want to permanently rem: Are you sure you want to permanently remove your game?
